an10.196:3.1: 196 Principles That Should Be Made Much Of
an10.196:4.1: “I will teach you the principle to make much of and the principle not to make much of. …
an10.196:4.3: And what is the principle not to make much of?
an10.196:4.6: This is called the principle not to make much of.
an10.196:5.1: And what is the principle to make much of?
an10.196:5.4: This is called the principle to make much of.”
